thread.section_title: The Westin San Francisco Airport - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Millbrae, CA) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice and Clean
thread.title_full: Nice and Clean - Review of The Westin San Francisco Airport, Millbrae, CA - TripAdvisor

author: wkgano
title: Nice and Clean
text:
The rooms in this hotel are nice and clean, but they are dated. There have been some feeble attempts to modernize a few things in the room, but they could use a complete remodel. The rooms on the side of the airport are loud, but that is to be expected. Wifi is not a free service and I thought that was a little strange. What year is this??
The breakfast buffet is pricey as well.
Overall a good stay, but could use some guest improvements.
